resources.string: Read the numbers in first screen. Tap the same numbers in same order in next screen. Wrong number will end game\n Correct answer will give you 100 points.
Read the words in first screen. Tap the same words in same order in next screen. Wrong word will end game\nCorrect answer will give you 100 points.
Tap on 2 cards to show their faces. If they match- in suit and number, they are cleared, you get points. If they dont they are kept back.
Sorry! You have lost the game!
Congratulations. You have cleared this level!!
Game has four colored buttons each producing different note. \n\nOne or more buttons light up producing a series of notes. You should repeat the same pattern by pressing the buttons.
Faces are shown for a few seconds. \n\nThen one of the faces is replaced with a new face. You should identify and tap on changed face.
A pattern of red cells is shown for few seconds. Then these cells are covered. You should repeat that pattern by pressing the cells.
Memory Ace 1.0\nBy Hegdeapps\nFor bouquets and brickbats write to hegdeapps.adm@gmail.com
